Get the cheapest shipping rates for free!
Start shipping at www.pirateship.com
USPS Commercial Pricing Rates â€¢ Effective January 22nd, 2023
The slowest service USPS offers for packages over 1 lb, with 2-5 day delivery estimates (but shippers often find it takes longer).
Rates are only based on dimensions, not weight, so you can ship up to 20 pounds for no extra cost.
Pirate Ship automatically rate shops between Cubic and Weight-Based rates for Parcel Select.
Learn more about Parcel Select Ground Cubic here.
To calculate the Cubic Feet of your package, round down the dimensions to the nearest quarter inch and calculate:
For boxes: Length x Width x Height / 1728 = Cubic Feet (Maximum 18" in any dimension)
For envelopes: Length + Width = Lookup Cubic Tier
Commercial Pricing - The cheapest rates USPS offers for this service!
No Monthly Fees - No Markups - No Minimums - Pirate Ship is FREE because we get paid by the carriers, not by you!
